videos.headline: Buffalo's Nunn comes up with tipped 51-yard reception
videos.description: Buffalo's Tyree Jackson throws a deep pass that is tipped and ends up in the hands of Antonio Nunn for a 51-yard reception.

videos.headline: Patterson jukes 11 yards for Buffalo TD
videos.description: Jaret Patterson jukes his way 11 yards to the end zone for the first Buffalo touchdown of the night.

videos.headline: Buffalo's Hill gets 93-yard scoop and score
videos.description: Troy's B.J. Smith fumbles and Buffalo's Tyrone Hill scoops it up and returns it 93 yards for the score to put Buffalo on top 24-21.

videos.headline: King gets huge face mask penalty
videos.description: Buffalo's Isaiah King grabs a handful of face mask and gets called for a big-time penalty.

videos.headline: Davis sprints 20 yards for Troy TD
videos.description: Sidney Davis navigates his way through the defense to score a 20-yard Troy touchdown to increase their lead over Buffalo 42-32.
